main.name: Shashi Bhushan
main.description: I am a software development engineer and I use Java, Spring, REST APIs, Springboot, python, cloud technologies, react, angular and other javascript based frameworks to develop apps, services. This is a portfolio project that can be used as resume
main.bio: Hands on Java Developer & AWS Certified Solutions Architect ( Core Java, REST/SOAP Web-services, Multi-threading, JPA, ORM, Spring-boot and other frameworks) with experience of designing and building highly scalable and fault tolerant APIs in a distributed systems on a cloud infrastructure (AWS or Azure). Very much comfortable with PL/SQL. With the world moving towards automation, AI , IOT etc, I really fantasize the charm these buzz words have brought into this Industry and the way it has opened up a plethora of innovation opportunities. My curiosity in this field makes me a "Beginner in Machine Learning and Big Data".

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech.) in Computer Science Engineering
Senior Secondary (+2) in Mathematics & Science as major

work.title: Software Developer Technical Lead
work.description: Ford Motor Company is going through a digital transformation and building subscription-based services REST APIs which are made available to the customers (vehicle owners) across world for various products (ex: Live Traffic, Smart Charge, Plug & Charge) through a product catalog. The catalogs are unique for each country based of what type of vehicles are launched in those regions. These features & subscriptions need to be activated on those vehicles Over the Air instantly by provisioning the actual feature through Modem present on vehicle. Handling payment for the subscriptions through Ford-Pay wallet.

work.title: Senior Java Developer
work.description: GE Transportation, a Wabtec Company - building the software on Predix platform (cloud-based Platform-as-a-Service (PaaS) for the Industrial Internet). Converted a monolithic application into microservices to lead the digital transformation. Building and maintaining the “e-Services”, a web application with monolithic architecture using JSP, Servlets, Spring 2 and Java 6 to serve users across globe with various services related to locomotive management and handling hassle of daily service repair floor activities. I worked with customer to do infrastructure migration as well as the real-time integration on the inbound and outbound process. Also, initiated a lot of digital transformation in team.
